data.title: HRA Meeting Dates
data.text:
PUBLIC NOTICE

HARRISON REDEVELOPMENT AGENCY

2024 Schedule of Regular Meetings of the Harrison Redevelopment Agency

Please take notice that in accordance with the NJ Open Public Meetings Act, N.J.S.A. 10:4-6 et seq., and the rules and regulations adopted pursuant to same (the “Act”), public notice is hereby given of the revised schedule of regular meetings for 2024 for the Harrison Redevelopment Agency (the “HRA”), Town of Harrison, Hudson County, at which any and all public business will be formally discussed, decided and acted upon.

ALL public meetings of the HRA (“Meetings”) will be held in-person at the Town Hall, 318 Harrison Avenue, Third Floor.

During the public comment portion of Meetings, members of the public wishing to comment may indicate to the Executive Director their desire to offer comments. When called upon, the person may address the Chairperson.

Members of the public may also submit written comments in advance of the Meetings, which will be read and addressed during the public comment portion of the Meetings. Such comments may be submitted via e-mail to Email HRA or by written letter addressed to Harrison Redevelopment Agency, Harrison Town Hall, 318 Harrison Avenue, Harrison, NJ 07029. All such comments must be received at least 2 hours prior to the scheduled starting time of the Meetings.

Whether made during the Meetings or submitted in writing prior, all public comment requires the person’s name and complete address. There is a 5-minute limit on all public comment, which may be extended by the Chairperson as needed.

Agendas and materials/exhibits for the Meetings will be available prior to the Meetings in the "Agenda Center" section on the Town's website at https://www.townofharrisonnj.com/AgendaCenter or may be requested from the HRA.

The following are designated as the Meetings of the Harrison Redevelopment Agency for 2024, at which any and all public business will be formally discussed, decided and acted upon:

MEETING DAY: MONDAY (unless otherwise noted)

MEETING TIME: 1:00 P.M.

PURPOSE OR AGENDA: ANY AND ALL PUBLIC BUSINESS

DATES:

For any questions or assistance, please go to Town’s Website at https://www.townofharrisonnj.com/193/Harrison-Redevelopment-Agency or call the HRA at 973-268-3477.

Gregory P. Kowalski, Executive Director
